dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3574353Y] [Fwd: [ADMINS] Copyright Infringement and Fraudulent Activ
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. [Fwd: [ADMINS] Copyright Infringement and Fraudulent Activity From One of Your Clients] Added by system at Wednesday, Mar 21 2007 02:41 pm X-MailFrom: cnewcomb@theplanet.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Mar 21 14:41:07 2007 Received: (qmail 4228 invoked by alias); 21 Mar 2007 19:41:06 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 4220 invoked from network); 21 Mar 2007 19:41:06 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 21 Mar 2007 19:41:06 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Mar 2007 14:41:05 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 14:41:05 -0500 Received: from spooling.inside.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.111] helo=spooling.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from cnewcomb@theplanet.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HU6gD-0005iV-6C for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 14:41:05 -0500 Received: from cd.2.210a.static.theplanet.com ([10.33.2.205] helo=[127.0.0.1]) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from cnewcomb@theplanet.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HU6g9-0003fr-F9 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 14:41:01 -0500 Message-ID: <46018A4A.7060308@theplanet.com> Date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 14:40:58 -0500 From: Chris Newcomb User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.10 (Windows/20070221) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [Fwd: [ADMINS] Copyright Infringement and Fraudulent Activity From One of Your Clients] Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="------------070108090209080106090301" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Mar 2007 19:41:05.0912 (UTC) FILETIME=[DDB24780:01C76BF0] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/html) Encapsulated message (message/rfc822) Headers of embedded message (message/rfc822) Received: from DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL ([172.16.220.10]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:51 -0500 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.110]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:51 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:51 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:51 -0500 Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HU3dG-0003py-RG for planetadmins@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:50 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from goat@swankdollars.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HU3d4-0003pk-3C for admins@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:38 -0500 Received: from mail1.contentbroadcast.com ([64.185.225.11] helo=contentbroadcast.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from goat@swankdollars.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HU3cy-0008Lh-Ck for admins@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 11:25:33 -0500 Received: from sabaweb33f8d59 [71.125.25.79] by contentbroadcast.com with ESMTP (SMTPD-8.22) id AC7103DC; Wed, 21 Mar 2007 12:25:21 -0400 From: "Chad Simon" To: Date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 12:25:27 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0056_01C76BB4.022AE780" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: Acdr1YjrnnMUnx6BT7yDd6lQI6KsRg== Message-Id: <200703211225953.SM03124@sabaweb33f8d59> X-Spam-Level: + X-Spam-Score: 1.1 Cc: legal@swankdollars.com, rob@swankdollars.com, donv2.0@gmail.com Subject: [ADMINS] Copyright Infringement and Fraudulent Activity From One of Your Clients X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Mar 2007 16:25:51.0127 (UTC) FILETIME=[9723F270:01C76BD5] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I am writing this e-mail to inform you that one of your clients is using our copyrighted material in a fraudulent manor. I have attached the site and the IP of all of the sites in which our material is being misused. Basically the owner of these sites ripped off our galleries and placed a codecaddon trojan where the surfer would click to view a sample video. This is what he is trying to install: http://codecaddon.com/download/codecaddon1164.exe We would appreciate immediate action to have this individual remove our content from his sites immediately. Copyright infringement is something that we take very seriously and we are prepared to use our full resources to protect our content and our name. The actions of this individual also jeopardizes the trust the surfer will have in our program and this will not be tolerated. We know it is impossible for a host to control the actions of its clients, so we are in no way holding you responsible for their actions. However, your assistance in protecting our content will allow us to rectify this amicably and expeditiously. We would appreciate any assistance you could give us. Regards, Chad Simon goat@swankdollars.com MIME element (text/html)

I am writing this e-mail to inform you that one of your clients is using our copyrighted material in a fraudulent manor. I have attached the site and the IP of all of the sites in which our material is being misused. Basically the owner of these sites ripped off our galleries and placed a codecaddon trojan where the surfer would click to view a sample video. This is what he is trying to install: http://codecad don.com/download/codecaddon1164.exe

 

We would appreciate immediate action to have this individual remove our content from his sites immediately. Copyright infringement is something that we take very seriously and we are prepared to use our full resources to protect our content and our name. The actions of this individual also jeopardizes the trust the surfer will have in our program and this will not be tolerated.  

We know it is impossible for a host to control the actions of its clients, so we are in no way holding you responsible for their actions. However, your assistance in protecting our content will allow us to rectify this amicably and expeditiously. We would appreciate any assistance you could give us.

Regards,
Chad Simon

goat@swankdollars.com
